member.summary: Represents a single media item in a timeline with provider identification.

member.summary: Gets or sets the provider name (e.g., "tmdb", "imdb").

member.summary: Gets or sets the content type (e.g., "movie", "episode").

member.summary: Gets or sets the chronologically ordered list of timeline items in this universe.

member.summary: Service for efficient content lookup using Provider_ID-based dictionary indexing. Provides O(1) lookup performance for large media libraries.

member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the lookup tables were last built.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ContentLookupService.TotalItemsIndexed
member.summary: Gets the total number of items indexed in the lookup tables.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ContentLookupService.BuildLookupTables
member.summary: Builds the lookup dictionaries from all available library items. This method should be called before performing any lookups.

member.summary: Finds a media item by its Provider_ID and provider name.
member.returns: The internal Jellyfin item ID if found, null otherwise.

member.summary: Finds multiple items by their Provider_IDs efficiently.

member.returns: Dictionary mapping provider keys to found item IDs.

member.summary: Clears all lookup tables and resets statistics.

member.summary: Gets lookup statistics for monitoring and debugging.
member.returns: A dictionary containing lookup table statistics.

member.summary: Indexes a single library item into the appropriate lookup dictionaries.
member.returns: True if the item was successfully indexed, false otherwise.

member.summary: Gets the appropriate lookup dictionary for a specific provider and content type.

member.summary: Gets the appropriate lookup dictionary for a library item based on its type and provider.
member.returns: The appropriate lookup dictionary, or null if not supported.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService
member.summary: Service for managing Jellyfin playlists with chronological ordering support. Handles playlist creation, updates, and maintains timeline order from configuration.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService},MediaBrowser.Controller.Playlists.IPlaylistManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.CreateOrUpdatePlaylistAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates or updates a playlist with the specified items in chronological order.
member.param: The name of the playlist to create or update.
The list of item IDs in chronological order.
The user ID for playlist ownership.
member.returns: A result containing the playlist operation outcome.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.CreateUniversePlaylistsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.UniverseMatchingResult},System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates multiple playlists from universe matching results.
member.param: The universe matching results to create playlists from.
The user ID for playlist ownership.
member.returns: A collection of playlist operation results.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.ValidatePlaylistItemsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid})
member.summary: Validates that the provided item IDs exist and are accessible.
member.returns: A validation result with accessible and inaccessible items.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.GetPlaylistStatisticsAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets statistics about existing playlists managed by this service.
member.param: The user ID to get statistics for.
member.returns: Statistics about managed playlists.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.FindExistingPlaylistAsync(System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Finds an existing playlist by name for the specified user.
member.param: The name of the playlist to find.
The user ID to search for.
member.returns: The existing playlist if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.CreateNewPlaylistAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},System.Guid,Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistOperationResult)
member.summary: Creates a new playlist with the specified items.
member.param: The name of the new playlist.
The ordered list of item IDs.
The user ID for playlist ownership.
member.returns: The updated result object.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistService.UpdateExistingPlaylistAsync(MediaBrowser.Controller.Playlists.Playlist,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.PlaylistOperationResult)
member.summary: Updates an existing playlist with new items while maintaining chronological order.
member.param: The new ordered list of item IDs.
member.returns: The updated result object.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService
member.summary: Service for matching timeline items with library content using Provider_ID-based matching. Prioritizes Provider_ID matching over title or other attribute matching for accuracy.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService},Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ContentLookupService)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The content lookup service for Provider_ID resolution.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService.MatchTimelineItem(Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Models.TimelineItem)
member.summary: Matches a single timeline item with library content using Provider_ID.
member.returns: The matched library item ID if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService.MatchTimelineItems(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Models.TimelineItem})
member.summary: Matches multiple timeline items efficiently using batch Provider_ID lookup.
member.param: The collection of timeline items to match.
member.returns: A dictionary mapping timeline items to their matched library item IDs.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService.MatchUniverseItems(Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Models.Universe)
member.summary: Matches timeline items for a specific universe and returns ordered library item IDs.
member.param: The universe containing timeline items to match.
member.returns: A result containing matched items, missing items, and statistics.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Services.ProviderMatchingService.IsValidTimelineItem(Jellyfin.Plugin.TimelineManager.Models.TimelineItem)
member.summary: Validates that a timeline item has all required fields for Provider_ID matching.
member.returns: True if the item is valid for matching, false otherwise.
